text:
[Verse]
Shadows dancing in the night
City lights are shining bright
Hear the whistle blowing loud
Midnight train above the crowd

[Verse 2]
Luggage packed with hopes and dreams
Rolling on the iron beams
Windows down the air is free
Riding to our destiny

[Chorus]
On the midnight train we fly
Stars above in endless sky
Leave our worries far behind
On this ride our spirits find

[Verse 3]
Rusty tracks and screeching wheels
Every turn the journey feels
Faces pass a fleeting glance
Lost in time this desert dance

[Chorus]
On the midnight train we fly
Stars above in endless sky
Leave our worries far behind
On this ride our spirits find

[Bridge]
Rolling hills and valleys green
Scenes like nothing ever seen
In the dark a journey new
With each mile our dreams pursue
title: Midnight Train
